title: Wordpress users Disclosure [ /wp-json/wp/v2/users/ ]
steps: Observe the list of WordPress users and their information
vuln_description: The WordPress REST API endpoint /wp-json/wp/v2/users/ is exposed, allowing anyone to view active usernames and potentially personal information of employees/authors. This information can be used for targeted brute force attacks.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it only requires accessing a known WordPress REST API endpoint. There are no complex interactions or states involved, and the endpoint's behavior is well-documented and common in WordPress installations.
